name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eBay Sold History Button - See Item Purchase History

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a 'HISTORY' button to the title on eBay product pages, to open purchase history. Quickly access it with a shortcut key!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
☘️️ New version released 
➤ Now you can also hit Alt+Z (Option+Z on Mac) to open the 'HISTORY' quickly!
➤ Enjoy support in 6 new countries!

Just open the product page, and you'll spot a shiny "HISTORY" button right next to the product title. Give it a click, and voilà! You'll be presented with the glorious sales history details, including date, price, and quantity.

With love, designed for dropshippers.

buymeacoffee.com/baransefa
